title: Pixel 6 long-term review: All the ‘Pros’ with very few cons [Video]
content:
Some six or so months after launch, we’re taking another look at what the Pixel 6 has done right and wrong in our long-term review of the entry-level Made by Google flagship phone for 2021 and most of 2022.

more…

The post Pixel 6 long-term review: All the ‘Pros’ with very few cons [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: How good is the Pixel 6 six months after release? We delve deep into our long-term review of the base Pixel 6 model in the lineup.
